definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: She rakes the ashes out of the stove in the evening every day.
sentences.chinese: 她每天晚上将炉渣从炉子里耙出来。

sentences.english: There is an electric cooker in the kitchen , The cooker is blue , It is on the left.
sentences.chinese: 厨房里还有一个电炉子，是蓝色的，放在左边。

sentences.english: Personally, I do not bake any PC in my kitchen oven.
sentences.chinese: 个人来说，我从来不会用我的厨房炉子来烘焙软陶。

sentences.english: The oven is made of bricks and the meat is roasted over it. It is called BBQ in short.
sentences.chinese: 炉子是砖砌的，可在炉子上烤肉，简称BBQ。

sentences.english: The oven is made of bricks and the meat is roasted over it. It is called BBQ in short.
sentences.chinese: 炉子是砖砌的，可在炉子上烤肉，简称BBQ。

sentences.english: Cold is defensed by the stove.
Mrs. Simpson put her soup on the stove.
sentences.chinese: 辛普森太太将汤放到炉子上。

sentences.english: The boiling soup subsides when the pot is taken off the heat.
sentences.chinese: 把锅从炉子上端开时，汤就不再沸腾了。

sentences.english: Turn off that pan you're smoking the place out!
sentences.chinese: 快把坐着锅的炉子关上你把这儿弄得都是烟。

sentences.english: He threw the snakeskin into the fire and watched it burn.
sentences.chinese: 他把蛇皮扔进炉子里，眼看着被火烧成了灰烬。

sentences.english: The chicken is wrapped in lotus leaves with flavours, then packed around with clay and baked.
sentences.chinese: 鸡先被包在荷叶里面，再包在泥土去炉子里烤。

sentences.english: I have a cake in the oven.
You should be able to perform fast heat-switches from the bare simmer to the rolling boil on your burners.
sentences.chinese: 你的炉子应该能在小火慢炖和大火沸腾之间切换自如。

sentences.english: Oil-fired boilers and furnaces need a yearly cleaning and tuneup.
sentences.chinese: 燃油的锅炉和炉子需要每年清洗和调整。

sentences.english: Take the saucepan off the stove.
A：Also, one of the burners on the stove doesn’t work.
sentences.chinese: 还有，炉子上有一个炉头点不着火。

definition: large kitchen stove made from bricks or earth/(PRC) ordinary mess hall (lowest dining standard, ranked below 中灶[zhong1 zao4] for mid-level cadres and 小灶[xiao3 zao4] for the most privileged)
to light a fire for cooking
see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
